title: No Loss Prevented?
body:
So just had a game, going to assume the servers fucked up (as they do) as all players from both sides disconnected. 

Normally wouldn't have a problem if everyone came back at the same time, BUT, 2 of my side reconnected, while all of theirs reconnected.

The lead we had? Gone.

So you can imagine how pissed I am that, not only did we lose the game we were destroying the opposition in, but I ALSO LOST LP!!

Fucking ridiculous.

replies.body:
Loss prevented is a "button" which Riot press when there's region-wide issues concerning players not being able to connect for a long period of time. Something like a temporary lapse in connection, even if it was Riot's fault, would not trigger loss prevented. Also, it is not activated on an individual basis, and unfortunately there doesn't seem to be a way to alert them to when the servers are stuffing up (they only use their internal tools to detect this).

It is ridiculous.
